name: Future Knight DX
description:
Future Knight DX

This is a fan remake of the 1986 game "Future Knight" by Gremlin Graphics Software. It is based on the Amstrad CPC version, it tries to stay faithful to the original, keeping the same level design, enemies and gameplay beats; while only updating things that make sense and that enhance the experience.

Made with Haxe + HaxeFlixel, the source code of this game is available on GitHub, plus some more detailed info. Check it out : https://github.com/john32b/futureknightdx

Controls
  • WASD - move
  • K - Jump / Select
  • J - Shoot / Cancel
  • I - Use Item
  • ENTER - Pause Menu / Inventory
  • You can redefine in options
Notes
  • Game saves progress automatically whenever you go through an exit
  • Items you pick up will go to your inventory. Press [ENTER] to open the inventory and [I] to use the item equipped
  • Recommended to play in Fullscreen Mode.
Wait, another Future Knight Game??

A while back I made and published "Future Knight Remake". That game was supposed to be what this DX version is now. But it didn't follow the original level design, and only featured the spaceship area. It was decent but in the end it was not the true remake I wanted it to be. You can still access it HERE. The password is 1234
